title: 213 - The Sailor Man
description:
It’s better to give than receive. One of the golden rules in life that so many forget about. Today on the podcast ET brings up the topic of having a giving versus receiving mentality. How it actually blesses you to put the needs of others before your own. How to make it a habit in your life even when you may be around people who aren’t reciprocating the concept. CJ rounds out the conversation on how being selfless is what led E to building the all-star cast he has around him. Take notes on how and why you should live with the mentality of wanting to give before you receive. 
 The Secret to Success Topics:
  [04:55] - Popeye’s Sandwich
 [13:20] - The Ultimate Sacrifice
 [22:00] - Don’t Kill the Flock
 [30:00] - Principles Over Money
 [42:20] - TEAM
 [56:00] - Who is Eric Thomas?
  Listener Perks:
  Organifi is giving our listeners 20% off of their order just go to www.organifi.com/success. Their superfood green juice powder allows you to get your greens anytime anywhere while on the go.
 Study when it’s convenient for you and take your mobile classroom wherever you go. Earn a quality online degree at an accredited college and enjoy all the benefits of the Ashford experience:   www.Ashford.edu/success

 
DCinvestllc.com Invest in real estate in the DMV area
  Secrets 2 Success:
  People who look after themselves are in a jungle.
 The biblical principle is to GIVE more than you receive.
 You’re not doing anything special when you do for your own.
 God created you to create opportunities for others.
 When you’re a taker you stop your momentum. 
  ET Events: 
  1% Tour
 Make Real Estate Real
 You Ain’t The Boss of Me Houston Feb 9
 Extreme Execution Coaching - Feb 22-23
 Game Changers 
  Get connected with a network of over 3,500 people who listen to ET, and embodies the work ethic and spirit of ET. To learn more about Breathe University. Subscribe to the podcast via  Apple Podcasts.

content:encoded:
It’s better to give than receive. One of the golden rules in life that so many forget about. Today on the podcast ET brings up the topic of having a giving versus receiving mentality. How it actually blesses you to put the needs of others before your own. How to make it a habit in your life even when you may be around people who aren’t reciprocating the concept. CJ rounds out the conversation on how being selfless is what led E to building the all-star cast he has around him. Take notes on how and why you should live with the mentality of wanting to give before you receive. 

The Secret to Success Topics:

  • [04:55] - Popeye’s Sandwich
  • [13:20] - The Ultimate Sacrifice
  • [22:00] - Don’t Kill the Flock
